Your name is Susan Parks and today you decided to take a hike through the local woods. As you get farther into the woods you happen to hear some faint voices nearby that sound high pitched. So you decided to go off the path a little ways in order to figure out where the voices were coming from. You finally found the source of the voices and appear to be behind a bush. But what you find behind the bush surprises you. What you see before you is a tiny village with inhabitants that look like ant sized amazonian warriors, some walking about and some riding on insects.
As you continue to look one of them finally notices you and soon all the tiny woman break out in a panic at the sight of gigantic you. But only seconds later a group of tiny warriors on bees fly right at you defending there village and throwing on you a purplish powder. As the powder hits you a weird feeling comes over and you begin to shrink, luckily your clothes are shrinking with you.
You start to freak out as you notice the shrinking is not stopping and the grass starts to grow even more taller. Finally the shrinking starts to stop but what you could see didn't make you feel better. All around the grass was as tall as redwoods and you had no idea how big you are until one of the bee riding amazons lands nearby.
When she stops in front of you her foot creates a loud thud as it lands and you look up past her sandal clad toes to see the now towering woman. She bends down to pick you up and you yell at her asking what she did to you. She responds with saying: "We shrunk you to ant size to us because you have trespassed and caused panic in our village."
But you tell her you didn't mean to do that and you were just curious. "It's to late for apologies now and the shrinking can't be reversed so you are stuck at this size forever" the amazon said. Shrunk forever you thought and you start to cry knowing you can never return back to your normal life. But the amazon speaks again "Also you will be punished for disturbing our village and I will choose your punishment."

144.content:
Danielle sighed as the elevator opened to floor 20. All Danielle could think was this was the end of her first, albeit short career after college. She had her 3rd poor sales quarter at Everything Corp and the CEO of the mid-size company, Alexis Serafina, demanded to see her late Friday afternoon. The executive floor seemed empty, as she walked the long hall to the tall mahogany doors at its end, the only sound the dull thud of her flats on the marble floor. Stopping before the doors, she took a deep breath before muttering, "It's going to be ok.". With each knock, a dull thud echoed through the hall before, "Enter" rang out from the other side.

With a final sigh, Danielle Collected herself trying to look tough and professional, hiding the scared young business woman inside. Pushing the door open, she gasped as her entered Ms. Serafino's office. Dark marble floors met dark cherry wood walls, which stretched up its cathedral ceiling. At the back of the office were massive floor to ceiling windows and the desk of Ms. Sarafina.

"Ms. Spark, please come in, let's make this quick." The woman spoke, her chair spun around, it's back facing Danielle.

"Yes ma'am" she replied almost running towards the desk. She stopped in front of the small chair on the other side of the desk.

"Don't sit." The voice of the CEO spoke again. Danielle stood and watched the chair spin around, revealing the beautiful young CEO. Her shoulder length Hair framed her perfect Mediterranean face. As she stood, Danielle watched the woman rise, for what seemed like ever. The white blouse and black slacks framed her body perfectly.

"You know why you're here, correct." Ms. Serafina spoke, the CLACK of her heels echoing on the floor as she walked around the desk towards Danielle. " Your sales number are subpar. I know you're new but failure is not an option here."

Ms. Serafina stopped directly in front of Danielle, who's breasts were at Danielle's eye level. She knew Ms. Serafina was tall, probably 5'8" or 5'9", compared to her own 5'1" frame but the height different was accentuated by Ms. Serafina's 4" heels, making her almost a foot taller than her young employee.

"I-I..." Danielle started to speak but was cutoff by the executive.

"I didn't want an answer. I think perhaps you were misplaced in a position. I'm told you have potential, so I have a proposition for you."

Daniel held her breath. She was sure she was going to get fired but this sounded like a second chance. Maybe Ms. Serafina wasn't as bad as everyone told her.

"You're going to work directly for me, 24/7, for an undisclosed amount of time. And you must start immediately. Otherwise you will be terminated. Interested?"

"Yes. Of course anything." Danielle spoke excitedly. What an opportunity to work with one of the new great minds of American business.

"Good." Ms. Serafina spoke, cracking a smile. She turned and grabbed something small off her desk.

"Understand this, you'll be with me at all times and you must trust me. This position will require you to see things from a new.... Perspective. Do you still understand?"

"Yes. Yes. It's an opportunity that can't be passed up." Danielle said, grinning now.

"Excellent. Then let's begin first by changing how you see things here." Ms. Serafina spoke, taking a step closer. She was almost on top of Danielle now. Danielle's personal space was invaded as her nose was almost touching her CEO's chest. She watched Ms. Serafina raise her hand, holding the device she grabbed up in the air. The CEO's face broke into a grin as she depressed the device's large red button.

Instantly, Danielle was enveloped in a green light.

"What-at's going on?" She managed to mutter before starting to scream. Ms. Serafina let out a chuckle as the light faded, and Danielle was no longer standing there.... Or so it seemed.

--------------

"Ms. Serafina, what was that?" Danielle said, trying to rub the light out of her eyes. Slowly her vision returned and staring forward, she saw something that couldn't be possible. Looking around nothing looked right. Her mind finally put things together and Danielle screamed, realizing she was staring at Ms. Serafina's ........

Your name is Sarah Jones, a thirty year old brunette banker, and you have a typical routine. You go out to Starbucks in the morning, your job from 9-5, then back to bed. Only this week had been different. When you got at work, you carried your latte down the pavement through a bunch of hippies protesting something stupid. While you ignored them, a certain brunette woman in her mid twenties blocked your path.

"Excuse me." You say as you try to walk around her. She doesn't budge and blocks you completely.

"Do you even know how corrupt the system is?" She asks you.

"No and I don't really give a shit either." You tell her. She makes a strict face at you and you attempt to slide past, unaware of the tablet she dropped in your drink. You took a sip of the coffee and the world around you started to get bigger, only for you to realize you were getting smaller.

info.brief_description: An interactive shrinking story by TinyGirl!  Erotic action with small women!
info.description:
This is some erotic shrinking material. If that's your thing, welcome. I'm trying to get all the paths to chapter ten first, but that may take awhile. A few notes:

-This is erotica. Grand philosophy and amazing plots are nice, but the goal here is much more sexual in nature.
-The characters are female.
-The story is in second-person.
-I update this as I can. That probably will mean on weekends at night.
-While I welcome additions from other writers, I'm not going to beg for them and I will have standards of quality.
-There's only female humans here. There's also going to be an absence of incest and old women.

Happy fapping! If I somehow capture your interest or orgasms, feel free to fan me and my story to get updates. =)
